text: Kiya tu nahi dekh raha kay Allah kay samney sajday mein hain sab aasmano walay aur sab zamino walay aur sooraj aur chand aur sitaray aur pahar aur darakht aur janwar aur boht say insan bhi. Haan boht say woh bhi hain jin per azab ka maqoola sabit ho chuka hai jisay rab zaleel ker dey ussay koi izzat deney wala nahi Allah jo chahata hai kerta hai
